name: Legendary Coffee Experience
description:
Do you have what it takes to work at the Legendary Coffee shops?

Start with a shift bussing tables to keep your store immaculately clean.

Blend the various international shipments of coffee beans into various product mixes.

Take orders from customers, listening carefully, while marking their cup, so the barista will know what they want.

Then take your turn as barista, to fill a variety of orders as accurately as possible.

New to making coffee professionally, no problem — our elaborate tutorials can help you through the various steps.

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone 5 displays.

Legendary Coffee™ is a Trademark of Overwatch Productions, LLC (DBA Legendary Coffee). Used under license.
